alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains; Southern Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 25 at 8:31AM MDT until July 25 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY WILL CREATE CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS THIS AFTERNOON AND EARLY EVENING... .Gusty southwest winds will increase once again across Southwest Idaho today, especially near the Nevada border and on ridgetops, during the afternoon and evening hours with very low relative humidity. This will result in critical fire weather conditions, particularly in fire weather zones 426 and 423. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES FOR OWYHEE MOUNTAINS AND SOUTHERN HIGHLANDS...WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 423 AND 426... * WINDS...West to Southwest 15 to 20 mph with gusts to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Minimum relative humidity values of 8 to 15 percent.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will occur shortly.
